name: SSW4200P
text: GIVE TO ANY CYBERTRONIC WARRIOR. SHOOT WEAPON. HEAVY MACHINE GUN. Add +4 to S. If warrior's S total is more than double the opponent's A total in Shoot combat when using the SSW4200, opponent is automatically killed if wounded.

clarification_text: CAST AS ONE ACTION. For 4D, you may force any player to discard his or her entire hand.
name: STORM OF CHAOS
text: ART OF MANIPULATION. CAST AS ONE ACTION. For 4 D, you may force any player to discard his or her entire hand.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY DOOMTROOPER AS ONE ACTION. The affected Doomtrooper is now allowed to attack any warrior in play. When attacked, normal affiliation restrictions apply.
name: SUBVERSIVE AGENT
text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER AS ONE ACTION. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. The affected Doomtrooper is now allowed to attack any warrior in play. When attacked, normal affiliation restrictions apply.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. For 3D, you retrieve any Fortification card from your discard pile and place it in your hand. Or for 6D, you may take a Fortification from your draw pile instead. You must then legally Build the Fortification in the same Combat Area as the Caster, including paying any action and D costs.
name: SUMMON DEFENSE
text: ART OF SUMMONING. CAST AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For 3 D, you retrieve any Fortification card from your Discard pile and immediately play it. Or for 6 D, you may take a Fortification from your Draw pile instead. You may only summon one card. You must still pay any D or action costs listed on the Fortification card.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. For 2D, you may immediately add any one PERSONALITY DOOMTROOPER from your discard pile to the same Combat Area as the Caster. You must pay the warrior's V in D. Or you may summon the Personality from your draw pile, but must pay double its V in D.
name: SUMMON HERO
text: ART OF SUMMONING. CAST AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For 2 D, you may immediately add any one personality Doomtrooper from your Discard pile to your Squad. You must still pay the warrior's V in D to add the warrior. Or you may summon the warrior from your Draw pile, but must pay double its V in D. You may only summon one card.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. For 4D, you may place any one Equipment card from your discard pile into your hand. Or for 7D, you may take the Equipment from your draw pile. You must then play the Equipment normally, including paying any action and D costs and giving it to a legal recipient in the same Combat Area as the Caster.
name: SUMMON ITEM
text: ART OF SUMMONING. CAST AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For 4 D, you may search through your Discard pile and give any one Equipment card from it to a warrior in your Squad. Or for 7 D, you may take the Equipment from your Draw pile instead. You may only summon one card. The warrior must be allowed to use the Equipment. You must still pay any D or action costs listed on the Equipment card.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. For 7D, you may place one Relic from your discard pile into your hand. Or for 10D, you may take the Relic from your draw pile. You must then play the Relic normally, including paying any action and D costs and giving it to a legal recipient in the same Combat Area with the Caster.
name: SUMMON RELIC
text: ART OF SUMMONING. CAST AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For 7 D, you may search through your Discard pile and give one Relic card from it to a warrior in your Squad. Or for 10 D, you may take the relic from your Draw pile instead. You may only summon one card. The warrior must be allowed to use the Relic. You must still pay any D or action costs listed on the Relic card.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. For 2D, the caster may retrieve any Art card from your discard pile and immediately cast it. Or for 4D it may take the Art from your draw pile. Caster must be able to pay any D or action costs on the Art card, and the spell must be allowed to be cast at the time of casting.
name: SUMMON SPELL
text: ART OF SUMMONING. CAST AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For 2 D, you may retrieve any Art card from your Discard pile and immediately cast it. Or for 4 D you may take the Art from your Draw pile instead. You may only summon one card. You must be able to pay any D or action costs on the Art card, and the spell must be allowed to be cast at the time of casting.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. For 2D, you may immediately add any one non-Personality DOOMTROOPER from your discard pile to the same Combat Area with the Castrer. You must still pay the warrior's V in D. Or you may take the warrior from your draw pile, but must pay double its V in D.
name: SUMMON TROOPER
text: ART OF SUMMONING. CAST AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For 2 D, you may immediately add any one non-personality Doomtrooper from your Discard pile to your Squad. You must still pay the warrior's V in D to add the warrior. Or you may summon the warrior from your Draw pile, but must pay double its V in D. You may only summon one warrior.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR BROTHERHOOD WARRIOR AS ONE ACTION. While attached, all Brotherhood warriors in the same Combat Area as this warrior may use the Art of Summoning.
name: SUMMONING EMPATHY
text: PLAY ON ONE OF YOUR BROTHERHOOD WARRIORS AS ONE ACTION. From now on, all Brotherhood warriors in your Squad may use the Art of Summoning. If the warrior is killed, this card is discarded.

clarification_text: PLAY ON ANY PLAYER DURING YOUR DISCARD STEP. The affected player may not draw cards during his or her next draw step.
name: SUPPLY LINE SEVERED
text: PLAY ON ANY PLAYER DURING HIS OR HER DRAW STEP, BEFORE HE OR SHE DRAWS ANY CARDS. The affected player may not draw cards during this draw step.

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. Each player must give you 3D for every warrior he has in play. If a player does not have enough D, take the remainder from the common pool.
name: TAXATION
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. Each player must give you 3 D for every warrior in his or her Squad and Kohort. If a player does not have enough D, take the remainder from the common pool.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. As three actions, the Tekron may replace one of the HERETICS in the same Combat Area with any non-Personality FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH from your collection. You must pay the new warrior's normal V in D and annihilate the HERETIC.
name: TEKRON
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. While in play, as three actions, the Tekron may replace one of your Heretics with any non-Personality FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH from your collection. You must pay the new warrior's normal V in D and remove the Heretic from the game.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO THE GAME AT ANY TIME. While in play, no warriors may perform Seek Cover actions.
name: THADEUS'S PALLET
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. While in play, no warriors may perform Seek Cover actions. Cracked and barren, this desolate wasteland offers little natural protection.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. NONCOMBATANT. The Great Darkness; Lord of all Apostles. While in play, all Dark Legion warriors in play are SLAYERS when combating DOOMTROOPERS.
name: THAT WHICH IS NOT TO BE NAMED
text: PERSONALITY. The Great Darkness; Lord of all Apostles. May never participate in combat or be in cover. While in play, any Doomtrooper wounded by a Dark Legion warrior is automatically killed.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. While in  combat this warrior may bring one Dark Legion warrior from in the same Combat Area into battle as a reinforcement for every 5D spent. The group adds together their F and S for the combat. Opponent may choose which warrior to battle.
name: THE BLACK GATE
text: GIVE TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR IF YOU ARE A NOTED COLLECTOR. For every 5 D, this warrior may bring another of your Dark Legion warriors in play into battle as a reinforcement. The group adds together their F and S for the combat. Opponent may choose which warrior to battle.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Premonition.
name: THE BURROUGHS CATHEDRAL
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Premonition. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A BROTHERHOOD WARRIOR. The Falcon will store one Art spell. Place any Art spell under the Falcon at any time. Warrior does not have to be able to cast it. Warrior may cast stored spell when appropriate by paying 8D. Spell stays with the Falcon after casting (except if the spell is annihilated after casting) and may be cast again any number of times, but only once between each of your Draw steps.
name: THE FALCON OF PILGRIMS
text: GIVE TO A BROTHERHOOD WARRIOR IF YOU ARE A NOTED COLLECTOR. The Falcon will store one Art spell. Place any Art spell under the Falcon at any time. Warrior does not have to be able to cast it. Warrior may cast stored spell when appropriate. Spell stays with the Falcon after casting and may be cast again any number of times, but only once between each of your Draw steps.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all your Brotherhood warriors are BLESSED. You may only have one copy of this card in play at a time.
name: THE FIRST DIRECTORATE
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. While the First Directorate–the Mystics–is in play, all your Brotherhood warriors may cast all aspects of the Art.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, you may perform one extra Standard Action every turn. You may only have one copy of this card in play at a time.
name: THE FOURTH DIRECTORATE
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. While the Fourth Directorate–the Administration–is in play, you may perform one extra non-Attack action every turn.

text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Mentalism. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Changeling. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Exorcism. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY BROTHERHOOD WARRIOR OF MODIFIED V:6 OR HIGHER. When put into play, all HERETICS are discarded. While it is in play, no HERETICS may be played, and warriors converted into HERETICS are discarded with no points awarded.
name: THE LIBER HERETICUS
text: GIVE TO ANY BROTHERHOOD WARRIOR OF TOTAL VALUE 6 OR HIGHER IF YOU ARE A NOTED COLLECTOR. When put into play, all Heretics are discarded. While it is in play, no Heretics may be played, and warriors converted into Heretics are discarded with no points awarded.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Elements.
name: THE LONGSHORE CATHEDRAL
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Elements. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Manipulation.
name: THE SAN DORADO CATHEDRAL
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Manipulation. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, opponents wounded by your Brotherhood warriors in combat are automatically killed, provided you pay the opponent's V in D at the time the wound is inflicted. Otherwise, it is a normal wound. You may only have one copy of this card in play at a time.
name: THE SECOND DIRECTORATE
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. While the Second Directorate–the Inquisition–is in play, opponents wounded by your Brotherhood warriors in combat are automatically killed, provided you pay the opponent's V in D at the time the wound is inflicted. Otherwise, it is a normal wound.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY IMPERIAL WARRIOR. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains +4 to F, and may force any non-Personality, non-Imperial warrior to be discarded as three actions and by paying 5D. No points are awarded. This does not use your Tactical Action.
name: THE SHILLELAGH
text: GIVE TO ANY IMPERIAL WARRIOR IF YOU ARE A NOTED COLLECTOR. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains +4 to F, and may force any non-personality non-Imperial warrior to be discarded as three actions and by paying 5 D. No points are awarded. This is not considered an Attack action.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Summoning.
name: THE STONE ARCHIVES
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Summoning. You may not have more than one Stone Archive in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, you earn 1D during your draw step for every Brotherhood warrior currently in play, even those controlled by other players. You may only have one copy of this card in play at a time.
name: THE THIRD DIRECTORATE
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. While the Third Directorate–the Mission–is in play, you earn 1 D during your draw step for every Brotherhood warrior currently in play, even those controlled by other players.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Kinetics.
name: THE VOLKSBURG CATHEDRAL
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. While in play, all of your Doomtroopers may cast the Art of Kinetics. You may not have more than one identical Cathedral in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR NON-PERSONALITY WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. Same-titled warriors in play may join forces with this one at any time (controlling player's choice). The group is considered a single warrior that you control. It uses the original's ratings, and gains +2 to F, S, A and V for each additional warrior in the group (individuals' effects still affect the game). If this card is discarded, the group disbands (distribute attachments to legal recipients).
name: TIGHT FORMATION
text: PLAY ON ANY NON-PERSONALITY WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. THIS CARD REMAINS IN PLAY. Copies of this warrior in play may now join forces with it at any time. The group is considered a single warrior. It uses the original's ratings, adding +2 to F, S, A and V for each extra warrior. The group may never separate. If this card is discarded, the group remains and may still be added to. The original warrior's player controls the group.

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. Each player must give you 2D for every Brotherhood warrior he has in play. If a player does not have enough D, take the remainder from the common pool. Then discard this card.
name: TITHE
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. Each player must give you 2 D for every Brotherhood warrior in his or her Squad (not Kohort). If a player does not have enough D, take the remainder from the common pool. Then discard this card.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME ON ANY HERETIC. The HERETIC has become transfigured. Annihilate the HERETIC and put any non-Personality FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH from your draw pile in its place. You must then pay the normal V of the FOLLOWER.
name: TRANSFIGURATION
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME ON ANY HERETIC. The Heretic has become transfigured. Remove the Heretic card from the game and put any non-personality FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH from your Draw pile in its place. You must pay the normal V of the Follower.

clarification_text: PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. You may alter the caster's F, S and A to anything you want, as long as the three numbers add up to the total of its base F, S and A. None may be altered below 0. After combat, the caster receives one wound, even if also wounded during combat. If killed as a result of this wound no points are earned.
name: TRANSMUTATION
text: ART OF MENTALISM. PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. You may alter the caster's F, S and A to anything you want, as long as the three numbers add up to the total of its actual F, S and A. None may be altered below 0. After combat, the caster receives one wound, even if also wounded during combat. Warriors killed in this manner do not earn points.

clarification_text: MINOR HERETIC GIFT. The HERETIC gains +5 to F, S, A and V.
name: UNGODLY POWER
text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. MAY ONLY BE BESTOWED ON HERETICS. The Heretic gains +5 to F, S, A and V.

clarification_text: MINOR HERETIC GIFT. The HERETIC has FIRST STRIKE. Opponents of the HERETIC are blinded and may not retaliate.
name: UNHOLY EYE
text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. MAY ONLY BE BESTOWED ON HERETICS. Opponents of the Heretic are blinded and may not retaliate in combat. The Heretic always strikes first in combat, and the combat ends immediately afterward.

clarification_text: MINOR HERETIC GIFT. The HERETIC gains +4 to F, S, A and V.
name: UNHOLY POWER
text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. MAY ONLY BE BESTOWED ON HERETICS. The Heretic gains +4 to F, S, A and V.

clarification_text: MINOR SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. PROFANE. May equip any Doomtrooper in play with any Cybertronic equipment card at any time with no action cost. May wound itself at any time to give any non-Personality Doomtrooper the Cybertronic affiliation.
name: VAC ENGINEER
text: IMMUNE TO THE EFFECTS OF DARK SYMMETRY GIFT CARDS, BUT NOT GIFT OF APOSTLE CARDS. May never cast Art spells. While in play, it may equip any Doomtrooper with any Cybertronic Equipment card at any time with no action cost. It may also give any non-personality Doomtrooper a Cybertronic affiliation at any time; this wounds the Engineer. If the Engineer is killed in this manner, no points are earned.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. FOLLOWER AND NEPHARITE OF ALGEROTH. BLESSED (and may cast spells on any warrior). Valpurgius is Alakhai's Archmagus, and may provide any FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH with any Dark Symmetry card at any time with no action cost.
name: VALPURGIUS
text: PERSONALITY. FOLLOWER AND NEPHARITE OF ALGEROTH. Valpurgius is Alakhai's Archmagus, and may provide any FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. with any Dark Symmetry card at any time with no action cost. He warps the Art and may cast any Art spell on any warrior.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY DARK LEGION WARRIOR. While in play, Equipment cards played on your Dark Legion warriors that are killed are not discarded; instead they are shuffled into your Draw pile. If this warrior is killed, its Equipment is discarded along with this card.
name: VAULT OF UNHOLY RESTORATION
text: GIVE TO ANY DARK LEGION WARRIOR IF YOU ARE A NOTED COLLECTOR. While in play, equipment cards played on your Dark Legion warriors that are killed are not discarded; instead they are shuffled into your draw pile. If this warrior is killed, his equipment is discarded along with this card.

clarification_text: Other non-Personality Bauhaus Doomtroopers gain +2 to F, S and A while in the same Combat Area with the Venusian Marshal. The Marshal will not affect its own ratings, but others may.
name: VENUSIAN MARSHAL
text: For each Venusian Marshal in your Squad, all your non-Personality Bauhaus Doomtroopers (but not Venusian Marshals) gain +2 to F, S and A.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. CHASSEUR. MINOR SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. PROFANE. Other CHASSEURS gain +2 to their F, S and A while in the same Combat Area with Diamond.
name: VINCE DIAMOND
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A CHASSEUR. IMMUNE TO THE EFFECTS OF DARK SYMMETRY GIFT CARDS, BUT NOT GIFTS OF APOSTLES. May never cast Art spells. While in play, all your CHASSEURS (but not Vince himself) gain +2 to their F, S and A.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. For every 10D you spend, any one warrior in play, regardless of affiliation, is discarded.
name: WAVE OF RIGHTEOUSNESS
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. ONCE CAST, REMOVE THIS CARD FROM THE GAME ENTIRELY. For every 10 D, any one warrior in play, regardless of affiliation, is discarded. This is not considered an Attack action.

name: WRATH OF ALGEROTH
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. All equipment cards in play are discarded, except those held by followers of Algeroth.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF MUAWIJHE. ZENITHIAN SOULSLAYER. SLAYER. Other ZENITHIAN SOULSLAYERS are SLAYERS while in the same Combat Area as the Slaughtermaster.
name: ZENITHIAN SLAUGHTERMASTER
text: FOLLOWER OF MUAWIJHE. Considered a ZENITHIAN SOULSLAYER. While in play, warriors wounded by ZENITHIAN SOULSLAYERS are automatically killed.
